projects.name: Telegram Bot Manager
projects.description: A bot designed for managing subdomain redirects, allowing users to create and manage redirects through Telegram.

projects.name: CryptCloud
projects.description: A project aimed at creating a secure cloud storage solution with encryption, utilizing C# for frontend operations and Python for backend API management.

projects.name: EasyDonate Payment Script
projects.description: A PHP script that facilitates the creation and redirection to EasyDonate products, streamlining the donation process for users.

projects.name: ShameSkin
projects.description: A Minecraft plugin that disciplines rule-breakers by temporarily changing their skins, enhancing server moderation.

projects.name: YTM Liked Songs to Playlist
projects.description: A Python script that transfers your liked songs from YouTube Music into a playlist for better organization.

projects.name: MultiSignBook
projects.description: A Bukkit/Spigot plugin designed to facilitate in-game contracts on Minecraft servers, allowing players to create and secure written agreements.

projects.name: BlockInfoAPI
projects.description: A Lua API for ComputerCraft that provides detailed block information using a command computer, enabling clients to request block data remotely.
